org.ggf.drmaa
Class InconsistentStateException

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Throwable
      java.lang.Exception
          org.ggf.drmaa.DRMAAException
              org.ggf.drmaa.InconsistentStateException
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class InconsistentStateException
extends DRMAAException

The job cannot be moved to the requested state.

See Also:
Serialized Form
